name: Bunny Mahjo
description:
Classic Mahjong Solitaire is not single-player game anymore. You can play with friends in 3d-environment. Play together, win together, unlock more figures together.

The bunnies from Minesweeper now play Mahjong - try new game with the characters you used to.

- cooperative mode - you can invite a friend or join them
- cute little environment
- color customization
- Leaderboard
- no defeats
- puzzle constructor

Some rules for multiplayer part
- only host can choose the puzzle or start a new game
- both host and client can use hints and shuffle the tiles
